attributes.action: create public holidays in each England, Scotland and Wales for their respective Patron Saints.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Northern Ireland receives a public holiday in March following St Patricks day. I believe England, Scotland and Wales should receive a public Holiday on or as close to their patron saints too. Therefore England will receive one in April, on the nearest Monday to St Georges Day. Wales in March for St Davids Day and again in November for Scotland for St Andrews day. This holiday should replace one of the two bank/public holidays in May.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
